rules.ruleString: Must be enrolled in course type {02, 04, 05, 06, 06G, 06PG, 06PGZA, 07, 07G, 07PG, 11, 42, 50PG, 56, 76, 78}

unitName: Teaching and learning in health professional education
description: This unit will involve participants in the development of their teaching skills, including the theoretical aspects of teaching and learning in a variety of settings.
faculty: Faculty of Medicine, Nursing and Health Sciences
